attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: the worst app i’ve ever laid eyes on. not only is it ran by a racist cheeto but it’s also FAKE NEWS i definitely don’t recommend.

attributes.title: no😹❤️
attributes.review: lol when i downloaded this app a cheeto broke into my house and stole my pot of gold🖐😔. whats even worse is that this delicious snack built a wall at the starbucks near my house so i couldnt get my strawberry refresher 🙈😡. at least i took a bite of the snack and it tasted good but it was 74 years stale 👁👅👁

attributes.title: a huge disturbing sight.
attributes.review: i got onto the app and the first thing i saw was an ugly orangutan with corn hair😖 just horrible pictures of ugly orangutans with corn like hair that made me extremely uncomfortable😳 this app should be removed immediately, i am scarred for the rest of eternity and will be needing therapy😔.

attributes.title: BLECK🥴
